Question Text: ## Session 2: Depth & Coherence ## Thank you for completing the second session. Please reflect on the following aspects.
The characters seemed to remember and build upon our previous conversations.
The world and the characters within it felt consistent and coherent.
I noticed relationships or history between the different characters.
My actions felt like they influenced the characters' attitudes towards me.
Describe a moment that felt particularly social or realistic.
Different NPCs responded in distinct ways to similar inputs during this session.
Describe a concrete example where two NPCs differed in their behavior or relationship dynamics in this session.
## Within-Session Social Comparison ## Compare Part 1 vs Part 2 (Test 1 vs Test 2)
Which part of this session felt more socially coherent (NPC relationships and interactions)?
Which part showed stronger NPC memory/awareness of prior interactions?
Please enter some facts that you learned about a specific NPC or its relationship
